website_summaries.verdict: There are multiple uses for this affordably priced full-body safety harness.
pros: Harness repels water and is brightly colored for visibility
cons: This product does not have the brand recognition that some others do

customer_reviews.title: Don't suggest testing as I did
customer_reviews.text: With a 12/10 pitch and being about 235lb, I would not suggest testing by sliding down 10 ft as I did, but rolled me on my back and stopped me about 4 feet from 14ft drop. Yea, it's worth having the extra cost and irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Airstreaming Harley

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I liked the adjustability of this safety harness over all else. Being a woman and wearing one can be tricky sometimes but I has no issues being safe and proper fit. The harness set up was fairly easy and felt that once clipped in I wasn't worried about having the clips let go. Overall it worked as expected and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MzMonka

customer_reviews.title: Great Harness
customer_reviews.text: I got this harness for a very different purpose. My brother has a medical condition and cant support his own weight so we have used it to assist his physiotherapy and recovery. Very comfortable and resistant!
customer_reviews.author: Elvira S.

customer_reviews.title: Will it work I wonder
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for 6’ “robust” body. But, no room for expansion. In order to lock the chest strap in place I realized after some time that the end of the nylon strap has to be pulled through the rubber lock strap (holds true for all straps, but this was the only one I needed to tighten.) I tried to keep it in place by placing it between the “ears” of the rubber strap, which does not work. How does one truly rate this without jumping off the roof? Give myself 5 stars for being sensible.
customer_reviews.author: John Houston

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly well built.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, works great. I needed a harness for 2 days of work and this one I felt like I could trust my life too for that long. I’m sure if I made a career out of it, I would probably spend a little more, but as a casual user this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Coreym

customer_reviews.title: Will keep you dangling (If you fall) and that's it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: Well made, strong, adequate for my home needs. My only complaint is some of the straps were twisted. While some were able to be removed and rethreaded, one was not. It was sewn with a twist. But it does job.
customer_reviews.author: Menocar

customer_reviews.title: Fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Though this X XBEN safety harness fit well. No instruction or diagram showing how to put it on was given in the delivery box. It would seem that who ever sell or made this assume that everyone knows how to put on a safety harness.
customer_reviews.author: DukeKh

customer_reviews.title: Harness
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet little hired to figure out how to put on but the people I know who use it like it alot
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Good safety harness for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best part about this product is the number of D rings. 2 high ones for ladder work, 2 lower ones for tower work, back one for roofing tie off. Plus the video how to put it on and adjust the straps was helpful. I used it so far for ladder work, plan on some roofing in the future and some TV tower work. Feel safe using this product. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: snowbound

customer_reviews.title: Be safe!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent harness system. I very much appreciated having five D-rings. Well constructed. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Don't skimp on safety!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, seem to be very durable. Got the job done. Not the most comfortable, but then again, what harnesses are? Would recommend, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: life harness
customer_reviews.text: strong and good support from hips to torso. worked great on steep roof.
customer_reviews.author: mark rinsler

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend was satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was definitely satisfied with his purchase. His job was also impressed that he was able to buy one for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Mayvette

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable and was at a very econmical price
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Strips not fastened
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't know how to fasten the strips.......they keep getting loose
customer_reviews.author: Honesty Co

product_meta.title: X XBEN Comfortable Roofing Fall Protection Safety Harness, 5D-Ring Full Body Fall Arrest Harness for Aerial lift, Ironworker, Scaffolding, Tower, Tree Climbing, Construction
feature_bullets: Great Built:X XBEN 5D-Ring Industrial Full Body Harness has One Dorsal Ring that is located on the back and Two on the shoulder, Two on the hip for work positioning purposes. The Dorsal Ring is primary used for fall arrest & also used for restraint & rescue. The front consist of two webbing loops which was used for seat sling or LADDER CLIMB attachment point.The two loops must be connected together with a carabiner or safety hook as one attachment point.

Super Comfortable: Our professional safety harness gives you comfort waist pad and leg pad assembly, provides workers infinite adjustment up and down and at angles for perfect fit. Great for Construction, Demolition, Climbing, Welding, Roofing, Camping, Emergency, First responder, Landscaping, Paving, Police, Railroad, Sanitation, Security, Surveyor, Arborist, Window Washer, Gutter Cleaning and more.

Solid Safety Structure: The safety harness meets or exceeds all applicable fall-arrest systems standards including OSHA, ANSI and CE certification.(EN361 and EN358). D-Ring was forged from heat-treated high quality solid carbon steel. Load: 22KN(4850lb).

Universal Sizing:One Size fit for men and women(S-M-XL). Waist size: 66-130cm(26inch-51.1inch) Leg size: 46-76cm(18.1inch-29.9inch) It's easy to put on quickly, comfortable to wear throughout the day and easy to use.

PREMIUM MATERIAL AND FIRM STITCHING: All our safety harness was made out of 100% premium high strength industrial synthetic polyester fibers, which has great performance in ageing, abrasion and heat resistance and ensures the strength of the webbing be up to 25KN (2500kg).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
